name: Killer Clown Video Call Game
description:
For this Halloween get into the Halloween Spirit with this Killer Clown Video Call And Texting Game!
If Halloween is your favorite time of year than get this app and prank your friends by make call with scary clown and make your friends scream.

This app contains pre-recorded video calls from creepy clown performed by professional voice actor. You can now make scary jokes with just one click.
This app is made for all people who like horror. So what are you waiting for, download it right now!

Functions:
- This is a offline game ! Don't worry about having the internet or not !
- Amazing graphics and design.
- Application is very easy to use
- Download this free game and play.
- This app will allow you to call scary clown

Please note this app has been developed only for fun purpose's and has no intention to hurt the user feelings, and should be used only for fun.
Warning: This app contains graphic images and sounds of a scary clown.
